::Spears::

She turns as Striker groans in pain.  She runs to his side. "The 
space time continuem? But what's that got to do with...." He 
dissappeared befoe she could finish her question.  She kneeled down 
at the spot where Striker was a moment ago.  She heard him say he 
would return.  She would have to wait for him.  Patients wasn't her 
biggest vertue.  So she would have to be pateint untill his return.  
She stayed there on the floor, looking down.  she whispered,"I'll 
wait. I"ll be here when you get back."

She satyed there for a while then got up and walked down the hall 
towards the bridge.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker sets off after Spears, his eyes wide from her kiss.
> 
> "Um... That's ok..." he mumbles, a sudden pain in his side.
> 
> "Argh!" he grunts, falling to his knees, his hand shimmering. He 
looks at 
> Spears, getting to his feet.
> 
> "The space-time continuim is breaking up a bit," he says to her, 
his hand 
> continuing to shimmer (in other words: my owner is going on 
vacation so I'll 
> be gone till he gets back), "I'll phaze out for a few days, I'll be 
back in a 
> bit!"
> 
> With that, the shimmering covers his whole body, Striker 
dissapearing with a 
> bright flash.
